title: Double-Blind Discussion Learning for Controversial Topic Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic logical reasoning and data analysis skills
context.additional_context: A language education program conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-limited environment.

learning_goals: Learners can collect and structure evidence from both sides of a controversial topic and present it.
Learners can develop valid arguments while avoiding logical fallacies from a randomly assigned stance.
Learners can maintain a respectful attitude toward opposing perspectives and provide specific feedback during discussions.

resources: Access to a Reliable Online Resource Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
